props.name: limitedToCanvasSize
props.desc: When `true`, the free drawing is limited to the whiteboard size. Default to false.

props.name: shadow
props.desc: Shadow object representing shadow of this shape.

props.name: strokeLineCap
props.desc: Line endings style of a brush (one of "butt", "round", "square")

props.name: strokeLineJoin
props.desc: Corner style of a brush (one of "bevel", "round", "miter")

props.name: strokeMiterLimit
props.desc: Maximum miter length (used for strokeLineJoin = "miter") of a brush's

props.name: width
props.desc: Width of a brush, has to be a Number, no string literals
